com.androidquery.callback
Class BitmapAjaxCallback

java.lang.Object
  com.androidquery.callback.AbstractAjaxCallback<Bitmap,BitmapAjaxCallback>
      com.androidquery.callback.BitmapAjaxCallback
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class BitmapAjaxCallback
extends AbstractAjaxCallback<Bitmap,BitmapAjaxCallback>

The callback handler for handling Aquery.image() methods.

anchor

public BitmapAjaxCallback anchor(float anchor)
Set the image aspect ratio anchor. Value of 1 implies show top end of the image, 0 implies at the center, -1 implies show at the bottom. A special value AQuery.ANCHOR_DYNAMIC will adjust the anchor base. This setting will add up from 0 to 0.5 bias and it's suitable for portraits and common photos. Default value is ANCHOR_DYNAMIC.

Parameters:
anchor - the anchor
Returns:
self

round

public BitmapAjaxCallback round(int radius)
Set the round corner radius. Note that the current implementation transform the image to a new one and will use more transient resources.

Parameters:
radius -
Returns:
self

getResizedImage

public static Bitmap getResizedImage(java.lang.String path,
                                     byte[] data,
                                     int target,
                                     boolean width,
                                     int round)
Utility method for downsampling images.

Parameters:
path - the file path
data - if file path is null, provide the image data directly
target - the target dimension
width - use width as target, otherwise use the higher value of height or width
round - corner radius
Returns:
the resized image

setIconCacheLimit

public static void setIconCacheLimit(int limit)
Sets the icon cache size in count. Icons are images less than 50x50 pixels.

Parameters:
limit - the new icon cache limit

setCacheLimit

public static void setCacheLimit(int limit)
Sets the cache limit in count.

Parameters:
limit - the new cache limit

setPixelLimit

public static void setPixelLimit(int pixels)
Sets the pixel limit per image. Image larger than limit will not be memcached.

Parameters:
pixels - the new pixel limit

setSmallPixel

public static void setSmallPixel(int pixels)
Sets the pixel criteria for small images. Small images are cached in a separate cache. Default is 50x50 (2500 pixels)

Parameters:
pixels - the small image pixel criteria

setMaxPixelLimit

public static void setMaxPixelLimit(int pixels)
Sets the max pixel limit for the entire memcache. LRU images will be expunged if max pixels limit is reached.

Parameters:
pixels - the new max pixel limit

async

public static void async(Activity act,
                         Context context,
                         ImageView iv,
                         java.lang.String url,
                         boolean memCache,

                         int animation,
                         float ratio,
                         float anchor,
                         java.lang.Object progress,
                         AccountHandle ah,
                         int policy,
                         int round)
AQuery internal use only. Please uses AQuery image() methods instead. Optimize memory usage if mem hit and there's no custom callback.
